venue.name: Best Western Royal Plaza Hotel & Trade Center

item.description:
The 3rd Annual Racer's Expo is underway. Bringing Northeast hardcore racers and national vendors together under one roof.

The Expo schedule is:
Friday, February 10, 2012 - 4 PM to 9 PM
Saturday, February 11, 2012 - 10 AM to 7 PM

I plan on going there Saturday afternoon around 4.

 

ADMISSION IS FREE IF YOU PRE-REGISTER BY FEBRUARY 6th VIA THE BELOW EMAIL ($5 donation at the door if not registered):


reg.racersexpo@gmail.com


PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR:  NAME,  HOME TOWN,  &  HOME TRACK or RACING SERIES

 

There are seminars as well that are happening there.  If you are interested in attending them or for more information, check out their website - http://www.theracersexpo.com/
item.how_to_find_us: We can meet by the entrance to the Expo
item.name: The Racer's Expo
